description: The file defines a Flutter provider class 'ConsultationProvider' that manages consultation data, including fetching and scheduling consultations via an API client.

classes.name: ConsultationProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages consultation data, handling fetch and schedule operations with API calls.

methods.name: fetchConsultations
methods.description: Fetches a list of consultations with optional filtering by patient or doctor IDs.

methods.name: schedule
methods.description: Schedules a new consultation with specified patient and doctor IDs, scheduled time, and optional notes.
